title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 12, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 12, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary get together to discuss the breaking news in the Britney Spears conservatorship case as well as a surprising move by a Supreme Court Justice in a case surrounding Covid vaccine mandates.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
